item.title: Timely Beaver Music News #001
item.description: We're back! Bringing you a tasty mix of CD reviews including the Black Keys, Moe and the Raconteurs. Pepper in upcoming concerts like Buckethead, NoFX, Warped Tour, Supersuckers with Reverend Horton Heat, the Queers, and Mates of State to taste. Top it all off with a new music video by Neutron Dawn. Now that's a spicey meatball.
item.itunes:author: timelybeaver.com
item.itunes:subtitle: We're back! Bringing you a tasty mix of CD reviews including the Black Keys, Moe and the Raconteurs. Now that's a spicey meatball.

item.title: Timely Beaver Reunion
item.description: We are ringing in the New Year with a beaver reunion!!! We have music videos, movie reviews, cd reviews and a special surfing report. Sit back, crack a cold one, and enjoy the show!
item.itunes:author: timelybeaver.com
item.itunes:subtitle: We are ringing in the New Year with a beaver reunion!!! We have music videos, movie reviews, cd reviews and a special surfing report. Sit back, crack a cold one, and enjoy the show!

item.title: One Minute Wonders
item.description: Music by: NO USE FOR A NAME; GOOD RIDDANCE; NOFX; LAGWAGON; SUM 41; OPERATION IVY; SWINGIN' UTTERS; ME FIRST AND THE GIMME GIMMES. One Minute Wonders on this 2nd Anniversary Grande Finale Spectacular. We take a look back at the mystical origins of the Timely Beaver. Then look forward to our independent musical aspirations and concerts we want to see this summer. Plus, forthcoming CD's everyone should grab if they have the cash. "Give me a beer because that's a wrap!"
item.itunes:author: timelybeaver.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Music by: NO USE FOR A NAME; GOOD RIDDANCE; NOFX; LAGWAGON; SUM 41; OPERATION IVY; SWINGIN' UTTERS; ME FIRST AND THE GIMME GIMMES. item.title: Flashback 1990's
item.description: Music by: JAWBREAKER; STRUNG OUT; SCREW 32; BETTY'S LOVE CHILD. Reporting from Amadan's CD release party for their new album 'Pacifica'. We review the new album along with new music from Mates of State and Bright Eyes. Plus, the premier of Dave's custom bass, concert picks, and a CD giveaway.

item.title: Irish Drinkin Songs
item.description: Music by: DROPKICK MURPHYS; AMADAN; THE REAL MCKENZIES; THE BLOODY IRISH BOYS. Bring those bag pipes and whistles for this St Pattys Day party. We have with us our good buddy Dave. Who brings us tales of lore from Italy, along with a signed gift for all beaver believers. Support your local musicians and see some kick ass spring concerts.

item.title: Love Songs for the Retarded
item.description: Music by: THE QUEERS; MR. T EXPERIENCE; SCREECHING WEASEL; VENDETTA RED. Sweet Mona Lisa's Valentine! This month we travel to Europe in search of beer, awesome food, and a shit-ton of art. Dave is traveling to Italy and looking for your Italian tips. While Mike just returned from Amsterdam and Paris. PS -I love the Dutch!

item.title: A Punk Christmas
item.description: Music by: THE VANDALS; AMERICAN HEARTBREAK; THE RAMONES; ME FIRST AND THE GIMME GIMMES. Oi to the world. item.title: Tom Turkey

item.description: Just a recap of the beautiful weather we are having in Portland, Oregon. Along with other car trouble events. Plus some great music including a jam only three hours old. Now I'm hitting the pool!

item.title: The Reformat Show
item.description: music by: DAN, MIKE, TED also music by: NEUTRON DAWN - After much anticipation Dan visits the set of the Timely Beaver. This show includes words for wisdom from Vince Lee and Meg. Plus, Willy the timely beaver hops a train for some adventure. Now put your hands together for the twisted love ballads of Reesie Swanyo!
